document_data.caption: Marril, priest of Corellon.
document_data.name: Marril
document_data.patron deity: [[Corellon]]<ref group="note">While ''[[Neverwinter: Fury of the Feywild]]'' does not state Marril's faith, it says he is a priest of the [[Temple of Leaves]] in [[New Sharandar]]. According to page 178 of the ''[[Neverwinter Campaign Setting]]'', the Temple of Leaves is dedicated to Corellon.
document_data.mainbody:
'''Marril''' was an [[elven]] priest who served [[Corellon]] at the [[Temple of Leaves]] in [[New Sharandar]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|The frustrated [[fomorian]]s abandoned the scattered shards as useless, but that is far from true. With time and patience the artifact may yet be reconstructed.|Marril}}
document_data.History:
When the settlement of New Sharandar was threatened by [[Malabog|King Malabog]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Marril accompanied [[Iliyasha Guidingstar]] during her diplomatic mission to [[Neverwinter]].

Marril worked with adventurers from the city to locate shards of an ancient [[Illefarn]] relic that shattered into many pieces when it was stolen from the forest by [[fomorian]] giants.
